resources.name: Sign Up New Account
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Everyone

This endpoint is used to create a new user account. The created user account will be bound to the **Client** role only. It's recommended to use the Sign In endpoint after signin up a new account in order to generate the user bearer token.

System will not return the `password` attribute, which by default is hashed for security purpose.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
email: string|email|max:255
password: string|min:8|max:255
name: string|min:2|max:255
address: string
```

resources.name: Monoxide
resources.description: REST API Documentation for Monoxide API

resources.name: Sign In Existing Account
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Everyone

This endpoint used to generate a new user bearer token that can simulate a Sign In / Log In workflow in the app. The generated user token will be authorized with **CLIENT** role only.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
email: string|email|max:255
password: string|min:8|max:255
```

resources.name: Get All Client's Room
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to get all the client's room data, with a pagination support.

In order to implement the pagination feature, please refer to this docs: https://www.prisma.io/docs/concepts/components/prisma-client/pagination#offset-pagination.

We use a offset-based pagination.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Optional Query Parameters:**
```bash
skip: number|positive (default 0)
take: number|positive (default 15)
```

resources.name: Add New Client's Room
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to add a new client's room data.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
name: string|min:2|max:255
```

resources.name: Update Existing Client's Room
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to update an existing client's room data.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Query Parameters:**
```bash
id: number|positive
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
name: string|min:2|max:255
```

resources.name: Delete Existing Client's Room
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to remove an existing client's room data.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Query Parameters:**
```bash
id: number|positive
```

resources.name: Add New Client's Device
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to add a new client's device data. Adding a device data will require a registered **device UID**.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
roomId: number|positive
uid string|min:36|max:255
name: string|min:2|max:255
```

resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to remove an existing client's device data.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Query Parameters:**
```bash
id: number|positive
```

resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to update an existing client's device data.

```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Query Parameters:**

```bash
id: number|positive
```

**Required Body (JSON):**

resources.name: View Client's Profile
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint is used to view the client's user profile.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

resources.name: Reset Client's Account Password
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to update the client's account password.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
password: string|min:8|max:255

```

resources.name: Update Client's Account Profile
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to update the client's account profile.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

```bash
name: string|min:2|max:255
```

resources.name: Get All Client's Report
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to get all the client's report data, with a pagination support.

In order to implement the pagination feature, please refer to this docs: https://www.prisma.io/docs/concepts/components/prisma-client/pagination#offset-pagination.

We use a offset-based pagination.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Optional Query Parameters:**
```bash
skip: number|positive (default 0)
take: number|positive (default 15)
status: string (all|open|accepted|closed)
level: string (all|client|guard)
```

resources.name: Update Existing Client's Report Status
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Client

This endpoint used to update an existing client's report status. Report's status can only be updated once with either of these values: `ACCEPTED` or `CLOSED`.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Query Parameters:**
```bash
id: number
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
status: string|min:4|max:255
message: string|optional
```

resources.description:

This endpoint is used to view the guard user profile.

```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

```bash
Authorization
```

```bash
password: string|min:8|max:255
confirmPassword: equal:password
```

resources.description:
> Authorizable by Guard

This endpoint used to get all the reports data, with a pagination support.

In order to implement the pagination feature, please refer to this docs: https://www.prisma.io/docs/concepts/components/prisma-client/pagination#offset-pagination.

```bash
Authorization
```

resources.name: Update Existing Report Status
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Guard

This endpoint used to update an existing report status. Report's status can only be updated once with either of these values: `DONE` or `CLOSED`.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Authorization
```

**Required Query Parameters:**
```bash
id: number|positive
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
status: string|min:4|max:255
message: string|optional
```

resources.name: Synchronize Device Uptime
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Device

This endpoint used to synchronize the device uptime on the server. Using this endpoint on the first time device boot will register the device `uid` to the server. No request body is required.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Device-Key
```

resources.name: Add New Detection Report
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Device

This endpoint used to add a new detection report. The detection level body is using integer range as explained below:

- `LOW` : 1 (The detected gas level is non-lethal)
- `MEDIUM` : 2 (The detected gas level is lethal, suggested to do fast anticipation)
- `HIGH` : 3 (The detected gas level is highly lethal, flammable, and dangerous. Highly suggested to leave the place immediately)

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Device-Key
```

**Required Body (JSON):**
```bash
detectionLevel: number|min:1|max:3
```

resources.name: Get Report Data
resources.description:
> Authorizable by Device

This endpoint used to get a report data based on the given identifier.

**Required Headers:**
```bash
Api-Key
Device-Key
```

**Required Query Parameters:**
```bash
id: number|positive
```
